nodes.text: The Vanguerre Artists' Workshop was a collective of artisans based on Vanguerre XI. The group produced six prototypes including the SolarNova TT-86 landspeeder before dissolving on the eve of the Clone Wars, which began in the year 22 BBY.
The Vanguerre Artists' Workshop was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Incredible Cross-Sections, a reference book written by Jason Fry, and released on December 15, 2017.
